sources.title: 1940 Stern Von Rio ( Gustav Diessl, Max Gülstorff, Harald Paulsen, Harry Hardt, Fritz Kampers)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1940. Stern von Rio.  U.a mit Gustav Diessl und Harald Paulsen

metadata.Plot: Concha flies from his natal Rio to Germany to help his loved one, who has been caught after finding some diamonds in a mine already registered by a company. Amongst them is the impressive one which thanks to her will be known as The Star from Rio. She finds herself staying at the manager's home hired as a dancer to present the diamond at a fashion show. Then the lights go suddenly out.
metadata.Writer: Hans Fritz Köllner, Felix von Eckardt
metadata.Actors: La Jana, Gustav Diessl, Werner Scharf
